Fetch.fetchXml: <fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="true" page="1" count="1"> <entity name="account"> <attribute name="name"/> <attribute name="statuscode"/> <attribute name="accountid"/> <attribute name="websiteurl"/> <attribute name="surf_isinstelling"/> <attribute name="surf_ss_authentication_domain"/> <order attribute="name" descending="false"/> <link-entity name="lmng_licenseagreement" from="lmng_organisationid" to="accountid" alias="license"> <attribute name="lmng_number"/> <attribute name="lmng_validfrom"/> <attribute name="lmng_validto"/> <filter type="and"> <condition attribute="lmng_validfrom" operator="on-or-before" value="%VALID_ON%"/> <condition attribute="lmng_validto" operator="on-or-after" value="%VALID_ON%"/> <condition attribute="statuscode" operator="eq" value="4"/> </filter> <link-entity name="lmng_productvariation" from="lmng_productvariationid" to="lmng_productvariationid" alias="productvariation"> <attribute name="lmng_name"/> <attribute name="lmng_description"/> <attribute name="lmng_deliverymethodid" /> <filter type="and"> <condition attribute="lmng_licensemodel" operator="eq" value="2"/> </filter> <link-entity name="lmng_product" from="lmng_productid" to="lmng_productid" alias="product"> <attribute name="lmng_name"/> <attribute name="lmng_description"/> <attribute name="lmng_descriptionlong"/> <link-entity name="lmng_image" from="lmng_imageid" to="lmng_productimageid" alias="image" link-type="outer"> <attribute name="lmng_url"/> </link-entity> <link-entity name="account" from="accountid" to="lmng_accountid" alias="supplier"> <attribute name="name"/> </link-entity> <link-entity name="lmng_mediationagreement" from="lmng_mediationagreementid" to="lmng_mediationagreementid" alias="mediationagreement"> <filter type="and"> <condition attribute="lmng_agreementtype" operator="eq" value="1"/> </filter> </link-entity> </link-entity> </link-entity> </link-entity> <link-entity name="contact" from="contactid" to="primarycontactid" visible="false" link-type="outer" alias="contact"> <attribute name="fullname"/> <attribute name="emailaddress1"/> <attribute name="jobtitle"/> </link-entity> </entity> </fetch>
